room_title: Escape room "Silo" by The Escapery in Atlanta
room_address: 1349 Old 41 Hwy NW, Suite 250 Marietta, GA 30060
room_description:
The Cold War is approaching the peak of hostilities between the United States and Russia and both sides are threatening to start a war that could end the world as we know it. Not satisfied with the mere threat of war, a rogue faction within the USSR is preparing for a nuclear launch against Washington, DC.
One of the two operatives investigating the hidden missile silo has missed his last few check-ins, and backup is needed. You are part of an elite CIA team who has been tasked with infiltrating the base, sabotaging the missile, and locating the missing agent before it is too late.
